pullRequest.title: [OWLS-79168] Run operator as non-root user
pullRequest.bodyText:

commit.message: change operator to run with non-root user

nodes.bodyText: Can you please check what this does to the image size?  It will likely be better to create the user/group first and then add the chown statement to the COPY: https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/builder/#copy
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,6 +25,12 @@ COPY src/scripts/* /operator/
 COPY operator/target/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-$VERSION.jar /operator/weblogic-kubernetes-operator.jar
 COPY operator/target/lib/*.jar /operator/lib/
 
+# make the operator run with a non-root user id (1000 is the `oracle` user)
+RUN groupadd -g 1000 oracle
+RUN useradd -d /operator -M -s /bin/bash -g 1000 -u 1000 oracle 
+RUN chown -R 1000:1000 /operator

commit.message: reorder dockerfile to minimize image size
